description: Detects when the MSSQL "xp_cmdshell" stored procedure setting is changed
false_positives: Note that since the event contain the change for both values. This means that this will trigger on both enable and disable
name: MSSQL XPCmdshell Option Change
query: (winlog.channel:"Application" AND Provider_Name:"MSSQLSERVER" AND winlog.event_id:"15457" AND Data:*xp_cmdshell*)
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali
